mapper.update: UPDATE Acdef SET xyear=#{xyear, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xper=#{xper, jdbcType=INTEGER}, xoffset=#{xoffset, jdbcType=INTEGER}, xaccpl=#{xaccpl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xaccrule=#{xaccrule, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xgetper=#{xgetper, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xname=#{xname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xlength=#{xlength, jdbcType=INTEGER}, xaccgl=#{xaccgl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xyesno=#{xyesno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xday=#{xday, jdbcType=INTEGER}, xdatedue=#{xdatedue, jdbcType=DATE}, xpreventry=#{xpreventry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xdateexp=#{xdateexp, jdbcType=DATE}, xbanklock=#{xbanklock, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zid=#{zid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ztime=#{ztime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zutime=#{zutime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zauserid=#{zauserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuuserid=#{zuuserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE zid=#{zid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
